nodes.text: Master Shawn - You are alive and well again! Good, Good! Gregor was so worried when the Young Master did not return from his hunt. Gregor got help for Master Shawn.
The Headmaster would be very angry at Gregor if the Young Master had died. The Wine Cellar would have been made off-limits for students to hunt the juicy Dire Drats if the Young Master had died.
Gregor is most grateful that Master Shawn killed the Giant Proach. Now there will be many more Drats in the Wine Cellar and the Proach room!
Welcome! You made it back - how wonderful! Did you bring Gregor any Drats?
Ah, you made it! I hope your hunt was successful.
Welcome back, Master Shawn.
Good, good. So glad is Gregor to see that you were not yet eaten by Drats.
Such a pleasure to see you escaped the Wine Cellar again!
Ah, did you find any delicious Drats or plump Proaches for Gregor?
Back from the dangers of the Wine Cellar already? Did you catch any Drats?
How lovely to see you safe, Master Shawn.
You have returned! Yes!
You are safe and sound and not too injured, Gregor can see to his delight.
Welcome once more from the dangers of the Wine Cellar!
I hope your hunt was a successful one, Young Master!
Again you braved the dangers and return triumphant! Young Master is quite the hero!
Back so soon? I hope you have a few Drats for poor Gregor, no?
Behold the mighty hunter returning from his journey!
Drats and Proaches, my, my, my. How brave you are, Young Master.
You have outwitted the enemies once again, Gregor sees with glee.
How good you are, Master Shawn, to help a poor Ratty like Gregor.
Young Master returns with many plump Proaches and delicious Drats, Gregor hopes.
Ah, young master likes to prowl in the small hours, like Gregor! Welcome!
Welcome, Young Master, to Gregor's store. Have you come to buy or sell or perhaps chat with Gregor?
So good to see you again, Young Master! Good morning!
Master Shawn has come to the store! Gregor is delighted.
Greetings, greetings, greetings!
Ah, so good again to see Master Shawn at the store. There is much rejoicing!
Good afternoon, Young Master. How may Gregor serve you?
Greetings! Have you come to buy some of Gregor's good things?
A fine day it is to see you, Master Shawn.
Good, good. You are here again! What can Gregor sell to the good Master?
It is the Young Master, here to see what Gregor can sell to him! Gregor is honored.
Good afternoon, again. Gregor hopes that Gregor can serve you.
Gregor's day is now better! Master Shawn has come to buy from Gregor!
Good, good, good afternoon to the Young Master!
Ah, Master Shawn has come again to brighten Gregor's day.
The Young Master is here! Gregor has many things to sell to you.
So happy is the day when Master Shawn comes to buy from Gregor!
Good evening, Master Shawn, what can Gregor help you with today?
It is evening, and the lonely hours have ended now that Master Shawn is here!
The Young Master is here! Perhaps he has come to hunt the dangerous Drats for poor Gregor?
The day has waned, but Gregor waxes ecstatic - Master Shawn has come for a visit!
A good evening to you, Young Master. Do you hunt Drats tonight?
Night approaches, but the Young Master is here to make things brighter.
Good evening, Master Shawn. Gregor hopes that you are happy.
Gregor is so happy to see the Young Master here this fine evening.
Night falls, yet here is the Young Master to make Gregor's day so better.
How may Gregor make your evening more complete, Master Shawn?
